analyzed: thera vāda vinaya
mahāvibhaṅga
pācittiyakaṇḍa
musā vāda vagga
dhamma desanā sikkhāpada

original: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
analyzed: tena samayena buddhaḥ bhagavā sāvatthiyam viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme

original: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā udāyī sāvatthiyaṁ kulūpako hoti, bahukāni kulāni upasaṅkamati.
analyzed: tena khalu pana samayena āyasmai udāyī sāvatthiyam kulūpakaḥ hoti bahukāni kulāni upasaṅkamati

original: Atha kho āyasmā udāyī pubbaṇhasamayaṁ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya yena aññataraṁ kulaṁ tenupasaṅkami.
analyzed: atha kho āyasmai udāyī pubbaṇhasamayam nivāsetvā patta cīvaram ādāya yena aññataram kulam tena upasaṅkami

original: Tena kho pana samayena gharaṇī nivesanadvāre nisinnā hoti, gharasuṇhā āvasathadvāre nisinnā hoti.
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena gharaṇī nivesana dvāre nisinnā hoti gharasuṇhā āvasatha dvāre nisinnā hoti

original: Atha kho āyasmā udāyī yena gharaṇī tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā gharaṇiyā upakaṇṇake dhammaṁ desesi.
analyzed: atha kho āyasmai udāyī yena gharaṇī tena upasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā gharaṇiyāḥ upakaṇṇake dhammam desesi
atha khalu gharasuṇhāya etat ahosi

original: “kiṁ nu kho so samaṇo sassuyā jāro udāhu obhāsatī”ti?
analyzed: kim nu kho saḥ samaṇaḥ sassuyā jāraḥ udāhu obhāsati iti

original: Atha kho āyasmā udāyī gharaṇiyā upakaṇṇake dhammaṁ desetvā yena gharasuṇhā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā gharasuṇhāya upakaṇṇake dhammaṁ desesi.
analyzed: atha kho āyasmai udāyī gharaṇiyāḥ upakaṇṇake dhammam desetvā yena gharasuṇhā tena upasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā gharasuṇhāyaḥ upakaṇṇake dhammam desesi
atha khalu gharaṇiyai etat ahosi

original: “kiṁ nu kho so samaṇo gharasuṇhāya jāro udāhu obhāsatī”ti?
analyzed: kim nu kho saḥ samaṇaḥ gharasuṇhāya jāraḥ udāhu obhāsati iti

original: Atha kho āyasmā udāyī gharasuṇhāya upakaṇṇake dhammaṁ desetvā pakkāmi.
analyzed: atha kho āyasmai udāyī gharasuṇhāya upakaṇṇake dhammam desetvā pakkāmi
atha khalu gharaṇī gharasuṇham etat avoca

original: “he je, kiṁ te eso samaṇo avocā”ti?
analyzed: he je kim te esaḥ samaṇaḥ avoca iti
dhammam me ayye desesi
ayyāya pana kim avocāti
mayham pi dhammam desesi iti
tāḥ ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti

original: “kathañhi nāma ayyo udāyī upakaṇṇake dhammaṁ desessati.
analyzed: katham hi nāma ayyaḥ udāyī upakaṇṇake dhammam desessati

original: Nanu nāma vissaṭṭhena vivaṭena dhammo desetabbo”ti?
analyzed: nanu nāma vissaṭṭhena vivaṭena dhammaḥ desetabbo ti

original: Assosuṁ kho bhikkhū tāsaṁ itthīnaṁ ujjhāyantīnaṁ khiyyantīnaṁ vipācentīnaṁ.
analyzed: assosum kho bhikkhū tāsam itthīnam ujjhāyantīnam khiyyantīnam vipācentīnam

original: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
analyzed: ye te bhikkhū appicchā pe te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti

original: “kathañhi nāma āyasmā udāyī mātugāmassa dhammaṁ desessatī”ti.
analyzed: katham hi nāma āyasmai udāyī mātugāmassa dhammam desessati iti

original: Atha kho te bhikkhū āyasmantaṁ udāyiṁ anekapariyāyena vigarahitvā bhagavato etamatthaṁ ārocesuṁ …pe…
analyzed: atha kho te bhikkhū āyasmantam udāyim aneka pariyāyena vigarahitvā bhagavataḥ etam attham ārocesuṃ pe

original: “saccaṁ kira tvaṁ, udāyi, mātugāmassa dhammaṁ desesī”ti?
analyzed: saccam kira tvam udāyi mātugāmassa dhammam desesi iti
sat ca bhagavān ati
vigarahi buddhaḥ bhagavān pe

original: kathañhi nāma tvaṁ, moghapurisa, mātugāmassa dhammaṁ desessasi.
analyzed: katham hi nāma tva mogha purisa mātugāmassa dhammaṃ desessasi
na itam moghapurisa appasannānam vā pasādāya pe

original: evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddiseyyātha—
analyzed: evam ca pana bhikkhave imam sikkhāpadam uddiseyyātha

original: “Yo pana bhikkhu mātugāmassa dhammaṁ deseyya pācittiyan”ti.
analyzed: yaḥ pana bhikkhu mātugāmassa dhammaṃ deseyya pācittiyan ti

original: Evañcidaṁ bhagavatā bhikkhūnaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ paññattaṁ hoti.
analyzed: evañca idam bhagavatā bhikkhūnam sikkhāpadam paññattam hoti

original: Tena kho pana samayena upāsikā bhikkhū passitvā etadavocuṁ—
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena upāsikāḥ bhikkhū passitvā etat avocuḥ
iṅghāyyāḥ dhammam desetha ati
na bhaginī kappati mātu gāmassa dhammam desetun ti

original: “Iṅghāyyā, chappañcavācāhi dhammaṁ desetha, sakkā ettakenapi dhammo aññātun”ti.
analyzed: iṅghāyyā chappañca vācāhi dhammam desetha sakkā ettakena api dhammo aññātunti
na bhaginī kappati mātu gāmassa dhammam desetun ti
kukkuccāyantā na desesu
upāsikāḥ ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti

original: “kathañhi nāma, ayyā, amhehi yācīyamānā dhammaṁ na desessantī”ti.
analyzed: katham hi nāma ayyāḥ amhehi yācīyamānāḥ dhammam na desessanti iti

original: Assosuṁ kho bhikkhū tāsaṁ upāsikānaṁ ujjhāyantīnaṁ khiyyantīnaṁ vipācentīnaṁ.
analyzed: assosum kho bhikkhū tāsam upāsikānam ujjhāyantīnam khiyyantīnam vipācentīnam

original: Atha kho te bhikkhū bhagavato etamatthaṁ ārocesuṁ.
analyzed: atha kho te bhikkhū bhagavataḥ etam attham ārocesu

original: Atha kho bhagavā etasmiṁ nidāne etasmiṁ pakaraṇe dhammiṁ kathaṁ katvā bhikkhū āmantesi—
analyzed: atha kho bhagavā etasmim nidāne etasmim pakaraṇe dhammim katham katvā bhikkhū āmantesi
anujānāmi bhikkhave mātugāmassa chappañcavācāhi dhammam desetu

original: Evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddiseyyātha—
analyzed: evam ca pana bhikkhave imam sikkhāpadam uddiseyyātha

original: “Yo pana bhikkhū mātugāmassa uttarichappañcavācāhi dhammaṁ deseyya, pācittiyan”ti.
analyzed: yaḥ pana bhikkhū mātugāmassa uttari chappañca vācāhi dhammam deseyya pācittiyan ti

original: Evañcidaṁ bhagavatā bhikkhūnaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ paññattaṁ hoti.
analyzed: evañca idam bhagavatā bhikkhūnam sikkhāpadam paññattam hoti

original: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū—“bhagavatā anuññātaṁ mātugāmassa chappañcavācāhi
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyāḥ bhikkhū bhagavatā anuññātam mātugāmassa chappañca vācāhi

original: dhammaṁ desetun”ti te aviññuṁ purisaviggahaṁ upanisīdāpetvā mātugāmassa uttarichappañcavācāhi dhammaṁ desenti.
analyzed: dhammam desetunti te aviññum purisa viggaham upanisīdāpetvā mātugāmassa uttarichappañcavācāhi dhammam desenti

original: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
analyzed: ye te bhikkhū appicchā pe te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti

original: “kathañhi nāma chabbaggiyā bhikkhū aviññuṁ purisaviggahaṁ upanisīdāpetvā mātugāmassa uttarichappañcavācāhi dhammaṁ desessantī”ti.
analyzed: katham hi nāma chabbaggiyāḥ bhikkhū aviññum purisa viggaham upanisīdāpetvā mātugāmassa uttari chappañca vācāhi dhammaṃ desessanti iti

original: Atha kho te bhikkhū chabbaggiye bhikkhū anekapariyāyena vigarahitvā bhagavato etamatthaṁ ārocesuṁ …pe…
analyzed: atha kho te bhikkhū chabbaggiye bhikkhū aneka pariyāyena vigarahitvā bhagavato etam attham ārocesuṃ pe

original: “saccaṁ kira tumhe, bhikkhave, aviññuṁ purisaviggahaṁ upanisīdāpetvā mātugāmassa uttarichappañcavācāhi dhammaṁ desethā”ti?
analyzed: saccam kira tumhe bhikkhave aviññum purisa viggaham upanisīdāpetvā mātugāmassa uttarichappañcavācāhi dhammam desetha ati
sat ca bhagavān ati
vigarahi buddhaḥ bhagavān pe

original: kathañhi nāma tumhe, moghapurisā, aviññuṁ purisaviggahaṁ upanisīdāpetvā mātugāmassa uttarichappañcavācāhi dhammaṁ desessatha.

original: Mātugāme vematiko uttarichappañcavācāhi dhammaṁ deseti, aññatra viññunā purisaviggahena, āpatti pācittiyassa.
analyzed: mātugāme vematikaḥ uttari chappañca vācāhi dhammam deseti aññatra viññunā purisa viggahena āpatti pācittiyassa

original: Mātugāme amātugāmasaññī uttarichappañcavācāhi dhammaṁ deseti, aññatra viññunā purisaviggahena, āpatti pācittiyassa.
analyzed: mātugāme a mātugāma saññī uttari chappañca vācāhi dhammam deseti aññatra viññunā purisa viggahena āpatti pācittiyassa

original: Yakkhiyā vā petiyā vā paṇḍakassa vā tiracchānagatamanussaviggahitthiyā vā uttarichappañcavācāhi dhammaṁ deseti, aññatra viññunā purisaviggahena, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
